text:
Stating that retirement benefits were not given to him in the past nine months, Jothimani (59) of Chikkanampatti, who worked in the transport depot at Hasthampattia, climbed a mobile phone tower and staged protest in Omalur here on Thursday. The police rushed to the spot and pacified him. After two hours, he came down.

Demonstration

Alleging that a councillor entered the office and threatened to chop the hand of an engineer at electricity board office, employees staged protest outside the office here on Thursday. It is said that AIADMK ward 30 councillor Adhiyaman questioned the workers who were laying underground cables in Arunachala Street. Condemning the incident, over 100 wormers staged protest outside their office.
title: Protest staged
